name: Seasons Change Demo
description:
Seasons Change Demo—Build: Day 25

Manipulate the seasons to open up new paths. Explore the landscape during the changing seasons. Float around obstacles using your parasol.

Controls:

  • Move—D-Pad, WASD, Arrow keys
  • Jump—A button, J key
  • Leap Forward—Down+Forward+Jump
  • Activate—R button, E key
  • Parasol—Up
  • Pause—Start, Esc
  • Restart—Select, R key (while paused)

I started this project in order to learn the Godot game engine. Find me here:

  • Dev streams at twitch.tv/circlefriendo
